snippet: The Bulls beat the Boston Celtics, 101-92, on Thursday night in Chicago for their sixth straight victory.
abstract: NBA Roundup; Chicago Bulls defeat Boston Celtics, 101-92; other basketball scores noted.
lead_paragraph: The Bulls beat the Boston Celtics, 101-92, on Thursday night in Chicago for their sixth straight victory.

headline.print_headline: Bulls Extend Winning Streak to Six Games, Downing Celtics
headline.main: Bulls Extend Winning Streak to Six Games, Downing Celtics
